result.markdown: --- #name: Md. Jubayer surname: Md. Jubayer Hossain position: "Founder, Management Lead & Data Analyst" #aboutme: Health Data Science, GIS and Remote Sesning, and Bioinformatics address: "[Center for Health Innovation, Research, Action, and Learning - Bangladesh (CHIRAL Bangladesh](http://chiralbd.org/))" #address: "Dhaka, Bangladesh" #phone: +1 617 432 7004 #phone: +1 617 945 4383 email: "contact.jubayerhossain@gmail.com" www: hossainlab.github.io github: hossainlab linkedin: hossainmj headcolor: 414141 date: "July 2023" output: vitae::awesomecv linkcolor: red urlcolor: red citecolor: red --- # Qualifications and Interests Highly motivated biomedical research enthusiasts with a Master of Science in Microbiology focus on public health and health data science. Research experience designing and implementing projects for biomedical data analysis (including next-generation sequencing, RNA-seq , and scRNA-seq ). I am interested in applying modern data science techniques in the context of disease diagnosis and large data analytics for public health while focusing on bridging the gap between computational and experimental laboratories through highly engaging and fruitful collaborations. # Technical Skills **Programming Languages:** Python, R, SQL, Julia, JavaScript; **Data Science:** scikit-learn, PyCaret, Dask, PySpark; **GIS & Remote Sensing:** ArcGIS, Geopandas, Xarray, Giovani, Google Earth Engiine; **Analytics Softwares:** SPSS, PowerBI, Microsoft Excel; **Survey Tools:** RedCap, KoboToolBox, EpiCollect, Google Forms; **Academic Writing Tools:** Microsoft Word, LaTeX, Mendeley; **Bioinformatics:** BioPython, Bioconductor, BioPandas, Galaxy, NGS, RNASeq, ssRNASeq; **Miscellaneous Skills:** UNIX, Version Control(Git), Web Scraping, APIs # Research Experiences **Center for Health Innovation, Research, Action, and Learning - Bangladesh** \hfill _Dhaka, Bangladesh_ Founder, Management Lead & Data Analyst \hfill _June 2020 - Present_ As the Founder & Management Lead at CHIRAL, I was responsible for establishing and leading the organization's efforts to advance health innovation, research, action, and learning in Bangladesh. Some of the functions associated with the role include: - Develop and communicate the overall vision, mission, and strategic direction of the organization. - Provide strong leadership and set the tone for the company culture and values. - Develop and implement operational plans and processes to achieve organizational goals. - Supervise and support the work of team members, providing guidance, feedback, and mentorship. - Collect, clean, and analyze data from various sources to derive insights and inform decision-making. **International Centre for Diarrhoeal Disease Research, Bangladesh** \hfill _Dhaka, Bangladesh_ Research Intern, Health Systems and Population Studies Division \hfill _February 2022 - June 2022_ I was a research intern of the Health Systems and Population Studies Division at International Centre for Diarrhoeal Disease Research, Bangladesh, focusing on mental health. Some of the functions of the role included: - Assisted PI in designing and implementing studies on mental health in Bangladesh. - Conducted literature reviews and data analysis to support research projects. - Participated in fieldwork, including data collection and data entry. - Developed keywords and biomedical database search strategy for systematic reviews. - Presented research findings at internal meetings and contributed to the writing of research reports and manuscripts. **Bio-Bio-1:: Bioinformatics Research Discussion Group** \hfill _Dhaka, Bangladesh_ Team Member, Bioinformatics Group \hfill _February 2017 - June 2019_ I was an active team member of Bio-Bio-1 providing support across different bioinformatics training programs at the organization. Some of the functions of the role included: - Pursued learning opportunities to advance knowledge and take on leadership position. - Contributed to team design training modules and content preparation. \newpage # Academic Credentials **Jagannath University** \hfill _Dhaka, Bangladesh_ Master of Science in Microbiology\hfill _January 2019 - January 2020_ **Jagannath University** \hfill _Dhaka, Bangladesh_ Bachelor of Science in Microbiology\hfill _January 2016 - January 2019_ # Publications 1. **Hossain, M.J.**, Islam, M.W., Munni, U.R. et al. Health-related quality of life among thalassemia patients in Bangladesh using the SF-36 questionnaire. Scientific Reports 13, 7734 (2023). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41598-023-34205-9 2. Towhid, S. Knowledge, Attitudes, and Practices among University Students regarding the Concept of “Safe Marriages” for Thalassemia Prevention in Bangladesh. # Data Science Projects 1. **ESOL: Estimating Aqueous Solubility Directly from Molecular Structure** \hfill _\href{https://github.com/hossainlab/ML_Projects/blob/main/regression/01_ESOL.ipynb}{\faGithub}_ - The Gradient Boosting Regressor model achieves an exceptional accuracy of 99% in predicting calories burnt during physical activities. 2. **Calories Burnt Prediction using Machine Learning** \hfill _\href{https://github.com/hossainlab/ML_Projects/blob/main/regression/02_Calories-Burnt.ipynb}{\faGithub}_ - The Gradient Boosting Regressor model provides 99% accuracy in prediction of Calories Burn. 3. **Heart Disease Analysis and Prediction Using Machine Learning** \hfill _\href{https://github.com/hossainlab/ML_Projects/blob/main/binary_classification/05_Heart-Diseases.ipynb}{\faGithub}_ - The Naive Bayes model achieves a 90% accuracy, precision, and recall rate in the prediction of heart disease detection, demonstrating its effectiveness in the field of machine learning. 4. **Hepatitis Mortality Prediction using Machine Learning** \hfill _\href{https://github.com/hossainlab/ML_Projects/blob/main/binary_classification/02_Hepatitis.ipynb}{\faGithub}_ - The Decision Tree Classifier model provides a prediction accuracy of 90% in determining hepatitis mortality, highlighting its strong performance in the domain of machine learning. 5. **Machine Learning-Based Prediction of Chronic Kidney Disease: An Analysis of Risk Factors** \hfill _\href{https://github.com/hossainlab/ML_Projects/blob/main/binary_classification/01_Choronic-Kidney.ipynb}{\faGithub}_ - The Random Forest Classifier model accurately detects chronic kidney disease (CKD) with 100% accuracy by considering important risk factors and patient information. This helps in identifying CKD at an early stage and designing personalized treatment plans for patients. 6. **Improved Breast Cancer Detection using Machine Learning** \hfill _\href{https://github.com/hossainlab/ML_Projects/blob/main/binary_classification/03_Breast-Cancer.ipynb}{\faGithub}_ - The Extra Trees Classifier model achieves an impressive accuracy of 95% in predicting breast cancer, making it a highly reliable tool for identifying potential cases of the disease. 7. **Machine Learning-Based Liver Disorder Prediction: Towards Early Detection and Diagnosis** \hfill _\href{https://github.com/hossainlab/ML_Projects/blob/main/binary_classification/04_Liver-Disorder.ipynb}{\faGithub}_ - The Logistic Regression model demonstrates a satisfactory accuracy of 78% in predicting liver disorders, indicating its effectiveness as a tool for identifying potential cases of liver-related conditions. # Teaching Experience **Jagannath University, Dhaka** \hfill _\href{https://jnu.ac.bd/dept/portal/web/microbiology}{Website}_ Teaching Assistant, Public Health & Hygiene, Department of Microbiology \hfill _October 2022 -
